query: SELECT DATE(dataVenda) as data, COUNT(*) as qtd_vendas, SUM(valorTotal)/100 as total_reais FROM vendas GROUP BY DATE(dataVenda) ORDER BY data DESC LIMIT 5
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute SELECT DATE(dataVenda) as data, COUNT(*) as qtd_vendas, SUM(valorTotal)/100 as total_reais FROM vendas GROUP BY DATE(dataVenda) ORDER BY data DESC LIMIT 5
